title: National Lottery results LIVE - winning Lotto numbers for Wednesday
text:
The midweek National Lottery draw has been made - and we've got the winning numbers here for you.

It's a triple rollover and if you grabbed a ticket you could have won £8.6million.

If you stuck with us you got the results of the main draw and the Thunderball draw before anyone else.

The winning numbers in the Lotto draw for Wednesday, October 30, are -

2, 8, 19, 41, 51, 56, and the bonus ball is 23

And the Thunderball numbers are -

1, 6, 15, 34, 36 and the Thunderball is 4

The main UK Lotto draw took place at 8pm and the Thunderball after that at 8.15pm.

You can win £500,000 in the Thunderball draw.

In case you missed it, the winning numbers from the last National Lottery draw, which took place on Saturday, were -

16, 23, 26, 38, 56, 59 and the Bonus Ball was 32.

The Lotto draw is alongside the millionaire's raffle, where one lucky player will win a guaranteed £1m, and 20 winners will walk away with £20,000.

You can buy tickets for a draw at the National Lottery website here up until 7.30pm on the day of the draw.

Lottery Tickets cost £2 per line, and include a raffle Millionaire Maker entry code. Thunderball Tickets cost £1.

We will reveal tonight's results, and Thunderball numbers, in our live blow below as they are drawn.
description: It was a triple rollover tonight on the UK midweek National Lottery draw with an £8.6million jackpot
